Articles.Content: I tried that but then i only have those parts available as it seems to override every part in the gamedata folder.
One thing i would like about the legs, please make them stable. Maybe spread really wide, bc they cratered the moon so much its hard to find a level ground anywhere.

I tried that but then i only have those parts available as it seems to override every part in the gamedata folder.

That happens sometimes when something is installed incorrectly or has a corrupted cfg file. If MagicSmokeIndustries is correctly installed in KSP_win/GameData, and the parts (and ONLY the parts) from DR are installed in KSP_win/Parts, everything works fine.

Getting frustrated with doing artwork & IVAs so I decided to take a small break to show a neat feature. What you see... or rather what you... oh never mind. It's still testing so you won't get what you... well. Enjoy!

A huge YES to sounds. KSP is lacking in sounds.

On a side note, another testament to the power of the adjustable rail:

That was awesome! what are you using to connect the rails in order to crush the command pod.

sidenote: I dig your music in the SSTO video.

Thanks! I used the little hublet and arms from the "DROMOMAN" modular arm pack to make a bridge from the front rail to the center, and used a 2.5m radial mount from the Spherical tanks pack with a clampotron Sr on it. Then struts from the big crusher to the other two rails in the back
any good idea on how to use the rail creatively/meaningfully?

any good idea on how to use the rail creatively/meaningfully?

creatively/meaningfully

Why on Kerbal would you want to do THAT?

any good idea on how to use the rail creatively/meaningfully?

You could build a ground-crew forklift with the exterior control thing.
why there is a separate download for 'Adjustable Rail'?

why there is a separate download for 'Adjustable Rail'?

To get the part out immediately without having to upload the whole pack again.
Yay Forklifts!

err you want fork lifts?

These are being adapted into a fully fledged forklift (with weighted balance) for the new MSI animator plugin, will be an entire forklift in one package

I also am making a version with a cage around it, I find things fall out when I drive around, so I want to be able to close the articulator.

Just playing around with a small crane, ive been reworking my little pick up truck and exploring the possibilities with the rails. I know the extension wheels are overboard to big. but the stabilization idea part of it will work.

Funny that you would use wheels and rails for stabilizers. One of the things Devo & I talked about were some legs that will be used for stabilizing cranes and such.

Is that using a docking washer for the base of the crane? Damn those are useful.
I think everyone knows it but I gotta say it, you sirkut and Devo are a kickass team.

Funny that you would use wheels and rails for stabilizers. One of the things Devo & I talked about were some legs that will be used for stabilizing cranes and such.

So far I have:

1. Sound works!

2. Customizeable speed control via the Servo Control Window (one speed for each grouping).

Moving parts in the VAB is not worth the effort so I'm tabling that idea.
